title: Stones River National Battlefield: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Check out an array of lesson plans and educational activities that allow teachers to use the park's resources in the classroom. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Browse the programs available to students visiting Stones River National Battlefield. All Field Trips     Guest Speakers Can't make a trip to the battlefield? Check out the programs our rangers and volunteers can present in your classroom. All Guest Speakers     Traveling Trunks When a field trip or guest speaker aren't possible, bring one our traveling trunks to your school. All Traveling Trunks
